alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Hughes; Hyde; Jones; Lyman; Potter; Stanley; Sully; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 6:43AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills ranging from 45 below to 55 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
